releases.title: Interactive Timeline Exploration & Genre Journey
releases.description: Click any year on the timeline to explore every concert from that moment, then tap a card to dive into an artist's full story. Plus, watch your musical taste evolve through an animated genre timeline that shows how your concert history shaped your sound.
highlights: Interactive year cards - click any timeline dot to see all concerts from that year
One-tap navigation from timeline to artist gatefold details
Animated genre treemap with decade-by-decade musical evolution
Genre drill-down to explore artists within each musical style

releases.title: Real-Time Tour Dates with Ticketmaster
releases.description: Discover when your favorite artists are touring and buy tickets instantly with live Ticketmaster integration
highlights: Live tour dates via Ticketmaster Discovery API (5,000 calls/day)
"ON TOUR" badge appears instantly when artist has upcoming shows
Direct ticket purchase links for every concert
24-hour smart caching with automatic artist name fallback

releases.title: Developer Experience & Documentation Overhaul
releases.description: Comprehensive documentation improvements and example templates for building your own concert archive
highlights: Two-path getting started guide (Quick Start vs Your Own Data)
Example CSV templates for concert data and venue status
Unified data format specifications in data/README.md
Privacy-first: Personal data files now gitignored with examples in repo

releases.title: Changelog Toast UX & Gatefold Refinements
releases.description: Improved toast notifications and refined artist gatefold animations
highlights: Optimized changelog toast UX with better positioning
Improved artist gatefold image loading
Fixed liner notes panel bleed-through during animations
Enhanced visual polish across gatefold experience

releases.title: Mobile Touch Feedback & Haptics
releases.description: Added haptic feedback for mobile interactions across the app
highlights: Haptic feedback on button taps and interactions
Touch-optimized UI elements with visual feedback
Improved mobile experience with tactile responses
Tier 1 mobile polish complete

releases.title: Artist Search & Smart Sorting
releases.description: Find any artist instantly with typeahead search, and see your most-seen artists first by default
highlights: Typeahead search across all 248 artists
Auto-scroll to artist and open gatefold
Default sort by times seen (most frequent first)
Smooth liner notes slide animations

releases.title: Venue Cross-Navigation
releases.description: Click any venue on the map to navigate directly to its details in the Venues scene
highlights: Clickable "Explore Venue â†’" buttons in map popups
Smooth scroll with spotlight animation
Auto-expand venue with child artists

releases.title: Artist Photos in Gatefold
releases.description: Open any artist's gatefold to see their photo alongside concert history
highlights: 94 artists (54%) display photos
Enriched metadata from Spotify, AudioDB, Last.fm
Graceful fallback to gradient + initials

releases.title: Timeline Hover Preview
releases.description: Hover over any year to see artist photos with subtle parallax effects
highlights: Artist imagery on hover
Parallax mouse tracking
Smooth fade-in animations

releases.title: Venue Photos on Map
releases.description: Click any venue marker to see photos, legacy badges, and concert stats
highlights: 96% of venues have photos (73/76)
Lazy-loaded with skeleton shimmer
Legacy badges for closed/demolished venues

releases.title: Google Places Integration
releases.description: Venue photos powered by Google Places API with smart fallback hierarchy
highlights: 66 active venues with real photos
Automatic fallbacks for legacy venues
Manual curation support for historical photos
